original_title: 生き写し美少女姉妹 甦りレズビアン-死してもなお、家族を見守り続ける美しき愛-
overview: Sayo lives deep in the countryside with her mother.  On the day she was born, Rei passed away.  Oddly as Sayo grew older, it was said her resemblance to Rei became more and more uncanny.  As days turned to years, disaster struck Sayo's household leaving her without a father and her mother gravely ill.  Soon after, she visited a shrine located in the mountains behind her home and there, Rei appeared before her and a relationship lost too early was rekindled in earnest.  Witness a tale about true love across generations from beyond the heavens.
title: Schoolgirl Lesbian Love Story Across Generations
